title: Apple's iPhone XS keynote was about story, not specs
description: Processor is back! After a long week of Apple coverage, Dieter Bohn dives into the question: Why does Apple keep doing these big hype-y keynotes? Apple does more than just present the phone, read the specs, and let us come take pictures of it. It tells a story.
